    • Method Detail

      • adapt

        public static Table adapt​(Table table,
                          Table schema,
                          Tables.ColumnHandling columnHandling,
                          Tables.DictionaryHandling dictionaryHandling)
        Adapts the table to the schema. The ordering and selection of the new columns is defined by the Tables.ColumnHandling and the dictionary adjustments for associated categorical column by the Tables.DictionaryHandling parameter.
        Parameters:
        table - the table to adapt
        schema - the schema to adapt to
        columnHandling - the desired handling for column ordering and selection
        dictionaryHandling - the desired handling for dictionaries of associated categorical columns
        Returns:
        the table adjusted to the schema
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if any of the input parameters is null
